text: Thomas Heath (10 December 1806 – 16 October 1872) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1828 to 1848. A right-handed batsman and wicket-keeper who played for Nottingham and Nottinghamshire, he made 20 known appearances in first-class matches.CricketArchive. Retrieved on 2 December 2008. He represented the North in the North v. South series. ==References== Category:1806 births Category:1872 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:English cricketers of 1826 to 1863 Category:Nottinghamshire cricketers Category:North v South cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Sutton-in-Ashfield Category:Nottingham Cricket Club cricketers
title: Thomas Heath (cricketer)
